text: Steven "Steve" Trenbirth is an Australian movie director, animator and movie producer known for directing The Jungle Book 2. He worked for The Walt Disney Company since 1990. In 2002, Trenbirth left Disney to form his own animation company Mad Cow Pictures. He has also directed The Adventures of Charlotte and Henry and The Legend of Secret Pass. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Australian movie directors Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Steve Trenbirth
